titleproper.value: Guide to the Beverly (Beldner) Kaplan Papers <num>MC.321</num>

creation.value: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace <date>2019-05-13T13:36:16</date>

extent.value: in 1 half manuscript box and 1 folder in shared housing

abstract.value: Beverly Kaplan graduated in 1948 from the New York University School of Commerce, Accounts and Finance. The Beverly (Beldner) Kaplan Papers consist of materials created and collected while Kaplan was a student at the School of Commerce, Accounts and Finance from 1944 to 1948. The collection includes photographs of Kaplan with her fellow classmates, a diploma, report cards, an engraved fountain pen and mechanical pencil with her name, a class yearbook, and a New York University alumna card.

p.value: Identification of item, date; Beverly (Beldner) Kaplan Papers; MC 321; box number; folder number or item identifier; New York University Archives, New York University.
Donated by Cheryl Wachtel in July 2017. The accession number associated with this gift is 2019.048.
Beverly Kaplan graduated in 1948 from New York University the School of Commerce, Accounts and Finance. Kaplan passed away in February 2017.

The Beverly (Beldner) Kaplan Papers consist of materials created and collected while  Kaplan was a student at the New York University School of Commerce, Accounts and Finance from 1944 to 1948. The collection includes photographs of Kaplan with her fellow classmates, a diploma, report cards, an engraved fountain pen and mechanical pencil with her name, a class yearbook, and a New York University alumna card.

subject.value: Universities and Colleges -- Alumni and alumnae.

corpname.value: New York University. School of Commerce, Accounts, and Finance.
